page.title: 07Medetcrown Limited
page.content: Medetcrown Ltd was formed in 1981 and its aims are to design, install, service, maintain and operate heating and steam systems in the commercial and industrial sector. There are currently four permanent employees but there are four more positions vacant for which interviews are being held. Most of the installation works are sub-contracted. Whilst the main office is at Mattersey most of the work is in South Yorkshire and the West Midlands, operating large industrial boilerplant for companies such as Yorkshire Traction Co Ltd and GKN Sankey Ltd.
